content: Sometimes, I get customers with unique head shapes at my stall who just can't find the right hat. {A失落}When I offer to take their head measurements for a custom hat, they would get scared and run away...

content: Please don't worry, I'm not upset. I'm used to feeling this way by now. I guess you could call it... feeling dejected?

content: {A失落}Do you also feel this way sometimes, moo? I'll teach you! So the next time you're down, we can feel <style=Highlight>dejected</style> together...
